title: Does pessat exam difficulty increase with time?

comments.body:
Yes. Every time you select a question, it picks from the pool based on how much time you have left. The lesser the time, the harder the questions. So the test starts with CBSE questions and can get as difficult as JEE Adv. Rumour has it that in the very last minute of the test, you are asked about your deepest fears and regrets.

/s
